name: Detective Game 37
description:
A local multiplayer game created for Ludum Dare 37.

Shortly after a murder has been committed, the Detective has gathered all the suspects at the crime scene to conclude his investigation. Surely, he would have no trouble identifying the real killer, and the guilty party wouldn't dare to flee before everyone's eyes, right? Not according to the murderer, who is acting cool, pretending to be just like the others, while simultaneously preparing for a quick exit.

Created by Alexander Bozhinov and Evgeni Petrov.

Used Topdown (Shooter) Pack

by Kenney Vleugels (Kenney.nl)

Post Jam version has only UX fixes.
